mapper.insert: insert into yellow_movie(id, title, tags, imgUrl, externalLink, internalLink, filePath, createTime) values(#{id}, #{title}, #{tags}, #{imgUrl}, #{externalLink}, #{internalLink}, #{filePath}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: select id, title, tags, imgUrl, externalLink, internalLink, filePath, createTime from yellow_movie where id = #{id}
